member.name: M:EasyAbp.WeChatManagement.MiniPrograms.Identity.ProfileAppService.BindPhoneNumberAsync(EasyAbp.WeChatManagement.MiniPrograms.Identity.Dtos.BindPhoneNumberInput)
member.summary: 通过微信开放能力获取并给当前用户绑定手机号，更新信息：https://developers.weixin.qq.com/miniprogram/dev/framework/open-ability/getPhoneNumber.html
